curam.common.util.xml.dom

Class Content

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.common.util.xml.dom.Content
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DomWrapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Attribute, CData, Comment, DocType, Document, DocumentFragment, Element, Namespace, ProcessingInstruction, Text

    public abstract class Content
extends java.lang.Object
implements DomWrapper
    Superclass for DOM objects which can be child content of Nodes.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Content()

      java.util.List<Content> cloneContent(java.util.List<org.dom4j.Node> contentList)
      Returns a list containing detached clones of this object's content list.
      Content detach()
      Detach the corresponding the underlying dom4j Node.
      java.util.List<Content> getContent(java.util.List<org.dom4j.Node> contentList)
      Returns the content nodes as a List of Content objects.
      java.util.List<?> getContent(java.util.List<org.dom4j.Node> contentList, Filter filter)
      Returns the filtered content nodes as a List of Content objects.
      org.dom4j.Node getNodeObject()
      Returns the Node that the implementing class is wrapping.
      Element getParentElement()
      Returns the parent Element or null if it is the root element or does not support the parent relationship.

    • Method Detail

      • getNodeObject

        public org.dom4j.Node getNodeObject()
        Returns the Node that the implementing class is wrapping. This must be overridden by subclasses.
        Specified by:
        getNodeObject in interface DomWrapper
        Returns:
        the dom4j node object

      • getContent

        public java.util.List<Content> getContent(java.util.List<org.dom4j.Node> contentList)
        Returns the content nodes as a List of Content objects. Changes to this list are not reflected back onto the original content.
        Parameters:
        contentList - the list of dom4j nodes
        Returns:
        the list of Content

      • getContent

        public java.util.List<?> getContent(java.util.List<org.dom4j.Node> contentList,
                                    Filter filter)
        Returns the filtered content nodes as a List of Content objects. Changes to this list are not reflected back onto the original content.
        Parameters:
        contentList - the list of dom4j nodes
        filter - the filter to use when filtering the content for return
        Returns:
        the list of filtered Content

      • cloneContent

        public java.util.List<Content> cloneContent(java.util.List<org.dom4j.Node> contentList)
        Returns a list containing detached clones of this object's content list. Changes to this list are not reflected back onto the original content.
        Parameters:
        contentList - the list of dom4j nodes to clone
        Returns:
        the cloned content

      • detach

        public Content detach()
        Detach the corresponding the underlying dom4j Node.
        Specified by:
        detach in interface DomWrapper
        Returns:
        the detached Content

      • getParentElement

        public Element getParentElement()
        Returns the parent Element or null if it is the root element or does not support the parent relationship.
        Specified by:
        getParentElement in interface DomWrapper
        Returns:
        wrapped instance of the underlying dom4j parent element.
